mapper.insert: insert into combo_order (com_order_id, price, com_oder_date, start_date, shooting_state, combo_id, shootting_location_id, customer_id) values (#{comOrderId}, #{price}, #{comOderDate}, #{startDate}, #{shootingState}, #{combo.coId}, #{shootingLocation.lid} , #{customer.custId})
mapper.update: update combo_ordert set price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, com_oder_date = #{comOderDate,jdbcType=DATE}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, combo_id = #{combo.co_id}, customer_id = #{customer.cust_id}, shootting_location_id = #{shootingLocation.lid}, shooting_state = #{shootingState,jdbcType=BIGINT} where com_order_id = #{comOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select com_order_id, price, com_oder_date, start_date, combo_id, customer_id, shootting_location_id, shooting_state from combo_order where com_order_id = #{comOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT coo.com_order_id, coo.price, coo.com_oder_date, coo.start_date, cu.cust_id, cu.cust_name, cc.co_id, cc.co_name, cc.co_desc, sl.lid, sl.lname FROM combo_order coo LEFT JOIN customer cu ON coo.customer_id = cu.cust_id LEFT JOIN combo cc ON coo.combo_id = cc.co_id LEFT JOIN shooting_location sl ON coo.shootting_location_id = sl.lid ;
